body.name: CIVAGO 32 oz Insulated Water Bottle With Straw, Stainless Steel Sports Water Cup Flask with 3 Lids (Straw, Spout and Handle Lid), Wide Mouth Travel Thermal Mug, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 4 hrs 25 mins
features: INSULATED SPORTS WATER BOTTLE: Featuring advanced vacuum insulation technology, CIVAGO 32 oz water bottle keeps your drink HOT for up to 12 hours and COLD for up to 24 hours, allowing you to enjoy icy cold drinks after intense workouts or a cup of hot coffee while winter camping.

WATER BOTTLE WITH STRAW AND LEAKPROOF LIDS: Our water flask is equipped with 3 leakproof wide-mouth lids: 1 flip-up straw lid, 1 easy-twist spout lid and 1 portable handle lid. All caps allow for easy one-handed or hands-free sipping when you are busy or on-the-go.

PREMIUM STAINLESS STEEL WATER BOTTLE: Crafted with food-grade 18/8 stainless steel, this 1 liter water bottle is durable and rust-free, allowing you to drink without worries. Its powder coating finish ensures a better grip, and its wide-mouth opening makes your ice filling and cleaning easy and fast.

STAY HYDRATED & REFRESHED: CIVAGO water tumbler cups come in 32 oz, 40 oz and 64 oz sizes and a variety of chic classic colors, enabling you to choose the bottle according to your mood while maintaining good hydration.

TRAVEL-FRIENDLY HYDRATION SOLUTIONS: Available in 3 different sizes and 3 leak-proof covers that can be switched at any time, CIVAGO metal water bottle is a great choice for your indoor workout and outdoor excursions. Its 3 caps are designed for you to drink anytime, anywhere. The handle lid makes your beach and camping trips easier, the straw lid is ideal for cycling and gym while the spout cover is perfect for hiking and hunting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great water bottle!
reviews.reviewText: I will start by saying that I have really enjoyed this water bottle. It keeps cold drinks cold, and warm drinks warm. The size and dimensions are great. And the lid options cover multiple use cases and preferences.When I accidentally dropped my bottle, the handle snapped of my lid. That was totally my fault, the lid itself does seem to be very sturdy and well made. I contacted Civago and they helped me get a hold of a replacement lid.This is a great bottle, and Civago seems to stand by their product with fast responses and good communication.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The bottle it self is very similar to the hydro flask without the price tag. I like that this bottle comes with 3 different lids as with the name brand bottles you have to buy each additional lid. This bottle would have been 5 stars if it didn't leak. It's very lightweight yet sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CIVAGO 32 oz Insulated Water Bottle - A Versatile and Reliable Hydration Companion!
reviews.reviewText: The CIVAGO 32 oz Insulated Water Bottle has completely exceeded my expectations and has quickly become my go-to hydration solution. This versatile stainless steel bottle offers more than just a way to quench your thirst; it provides unmatched convenience and quality. Here's why I'm so impressed: Impressive Insulation: The insulation on this bottle is top-notch. It keeps my drinks icy cold for hours, even in scorching hot weather. Conversely, it maintains hot beverages at the perfect temperature, making it perfect for year-round use. Generous Capacity: With a 32 oz capacity, this bottle holds enough liquid to keep me hydrated throughout the day. It's perfect for workouts, hikes, long commutes, or simply staying on top of daily water intake goals. Three Lid Options: The inclusion of three different lids - straw, spout, and handle lid - makes this bottle incredibly versatile. Whether I'm sipping on-the-go, using it at the gym, or carrying it with the handle, it's adaptable to my needs. Wide Mouth Design: The wide mouth makes it easy to add ice cubes, clean the bottle thoroughly, and pour or drink without any spillage. It's a small but essential design feature. Stainless Steel Durability: The stainless steel construction not only ensures the bottle's longevity but also gives it a sleek and modern look. It's built to withstand the rigors of daily use and outdoor adventures. Leak-Proof and Spill-Proof: I've never experienced any leaks or spills with this bottle, even when it's been tossed into my bag or backpack. The lids fit securely and prevent any mess. Easy-to-Carry Handle: The handle lid is a fantastic addition, allowing for easy carrying and attachment to bags or backpacks. It's a convenient feature for when I'm on the move. BPA-Free and Safe: I appreciate that this bottle is BPA-free and safe for my health. I can enjoy my beverages without worrying about harmful chemicals leaching into my drinks. Stylish Color: The indigo black color is not only sleek but also resistant to scratches and wear. It maintains its attractive appearance even after extended use.In conclusion, the CIVAGO 32 oz Insulated Water Bottle is a hydration companion that excels in every aspect. Its insulation, capacity, versatility, and durability make it a standout product. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast, outdoor adventurer, or just someone who wants to stay hydrated throughout the day, this bottle delivers on all fronts. I can't recommend it highly enough; it's a five-star solution for all your hydration needs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome! Great value and quality.
reviews.reviewText: I got one for my friend as a gift and after it was delivered I realized how good it actually is. So I ordered another one for myself, even though I already have bunch of different bottles that were sitting for a while in the kitchen drawers.My friend got engraved it for me for more custom looking. And now it looks awesome. The stainless still it made of feels a very good quality as well as paint job. What pleasantly surprised me that it comes with 3 different types of caps, yes, all of these for under $20! Awesome deal.And yeah, it keeps the hot water for me for a pretty long time. Highly recommend! You won’t regret.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stay Hydrated On-the-Go with the Insulated Bottle Water with Straw!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Insulated Bottle Water and it has quickly become my go-to companion for staying hydrated throughout the day. This innovative water bottle has exceeded my expectations in terms of design, functionality, and overall convenience.Firstly, the insulation of this bottle is superb. I was pleasantly surprised at how well it kept my water cold for hours, even in the hot sun. Whether I'm at work, hiking, or running errands, I can always rely on having a refreshing drink waiting for me in this bottle. It's perfect for those who are always on the move and need their water to remain cool and refreshing throughout the day.The built-in straw is a game-changer. It allows for sipping water effortlessly without having to tilt the bottle, making it extremely convenient for use while driving or during workouts. The straw is also detachable for easy cleaning, ensuring that I always have access to a fresh and germ-free drinking experience.In terms of design, this water bottle is sleek and stylish. The slim profile fits comfortably in my hand and the easy-to-use flip-top lid prevents any accidental spills. The bottle is also equipped with a secure lock mechanism, ensuring no leakage, even when I toss it in my bag or backpack.I also appreciate the generous capacity of this bottle, as it holds a sufficient amount of water to keep me hydrated for extended periods without constantly refilling. The wide-mouth opening makes it easy to add ice cubes or fruits for an infused water experience.Durability is another standout feature of this insulated bottle. It is made of high-quality, BPA-free materials that not only resist impacts but also prevent any unwanted odors or flavors from affecting the taste of the water. I've accidentally dropped it a couple of times, but it has shown no signs of wear and tear.In conclusion, I highly recommend the Insulated Bottle Water with Straw to anyone who wants to stay hydrated on-the-go. Its superior insulation, easy-to-use straw, and durable construction make it a must-have for busy individuals, athletes, and outdoor enthusiasts alike.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Keeps tea warm
reviews.reviewText: Since reviews on this design on the cup say it chips I painted mine and put epoxy over it. Not as cute but oh well won't have to deal with chipping I made tea at 8 a.m. and it's now 1:20 and it's still warm. Happy with the 3 lids and doesn't leak.
